Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Card>

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Card>
    This class represents a card.

      Creates a card.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the string representation of this card. The format is suit + face.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string representation of this card.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Card c)
        Compares this card with the specified card. Returns 1 or -1 as this card's face is one point bigger or one point smaller than the specified card. Returns 0 for other cases.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Card>
        Parameters:
        c - the card to be compared.
        Returns:
        1 or -1 as this card's face is one point bigger or one point smaller than the specified card. 0 for other cases.

      • equal

        public boolean equal(Card c)
        Returns true if and only if the face and suit of the card is equal to the specified card.
        Parameters:
        c - the card with which to compare.
        Returns:
        true if this card is the same as the c argument; false otherwise.
